an4.182:1: "Bhikkhus, against four things there can be no guarantor, neither an ascetic, a brahmin, a deva, Māra, Brahmā, nor anyone in the world.
an4.182:2: (1) What four? "There can be no guarantor, neither an ascetic … nor anyone in the world, that what is subject to old age will not grow old.
an4.182:3: "Against these four things, bhikkhus, there can be no guarantor, neither an ascetic, a brahmin, a deva, Māra, Brahmā, nor anyone in the world."
